## Screenshots / Videos

## How to test

Steps to verify locally:
- cd web
- npm install
- npm run dev

## Checklist
- [ ] Linted (`npm run lint` in /web)
- [ ] Builds (`npm run build` in /web)
- [ ] Updated docs (README/CONTRIBUTING) if needed
- [ ] Adds tests or manual QA steps
